title: docs: unable to build the docs.

labels.name: 2ndparty
labels.description: Will be a 2nd party plugin, pending 2nd party org

body:
## Describe the bug
Unable to build the documentation
## Steps To Reproduce
https://intel.github.io/dffml/master/contributing/docs.html
## Expected behavior
a directory pages should be generated.
## Logs or Screenshots

```log
ubuntu@ip-172-31-31-53:~/dffml$ dffml service dev docs
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/ubuntu/.local/bin/dffml", line 8, in <module>
    sys.exit(CLI.main())
  File "/home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/dffml/util/cli/cmd.py", line 288, in main
    result = loop.run_until_complete(cls._main(*argv[1:]))
  File "/usr/lib/python3.8/asyncio/base_events.py", line 616, in run_until_complete
    return future.result()
  File "/home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/dffml/util/cli/cmd.py", line 238, in _main
    result = await cls.cli(*args)
  File "/home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/dffml/util/cli/cmd.py", line 224, in cli
    return await cmd.do_run()
  File "/home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/dffml/util/cli/cmd.py", line 203, in do_run
    return await self.run()
  File "/home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/dffml/service/dev.py", line 1122, in run
    file_path.symlink_to(root.joinpath(*source))
  File "/usr/lib/python3.8/pathlib.py", line 1379, in symlink_to
    self._accessor.symlink(target, self, target_is_directory)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.8/pathlib.py", line 442, in symlink
    return os.symlink(a, b)
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/CHANGELOG.md' -> '/home/ubuntu/.local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/docs/changelog.md'
```
